project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game that allows the player to navigate through rooms, pick up items, view inventory, and encounter challenges.

task.name: Design game structure and layout for rooms
Create functionality to pick up and manage items
Create an inventory system to view collected items
Implement simple challenges (e.g., solve riddles or puzzles)
Write tests for each of the implemented features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
